/circle6 Administer two doses of TT injection.
/circle6 Provide at least 100 tablets of IFA.
B. Essential components of every antenatal check-up: 
/circle6 Take the patient’s history. 
/circle6 Conduct a physical examination–measure the weight, blood pressure and respiratory 
rate and check for pallor and oedema.
